review: I was looking for a way to stream videos from my laptop to a television without having to plug my laptop in directly via HDMI. With a chromecast and chromecast extensions (I use videostream) I can play videos for my friends and family while still being about to get work done on my laptop!
author: Melissa

review: Have not been able to get it to work, unable to pinpoint or resolve the problem .They make it sound as if it's a no brainier, just plug it in and you're good to go.I followed directions and prompts to the letter and no luck. I'll give it one more try,then it goes on Craigslist.
author: Craig

review: The best purchase I've ever done.
author: luis daniel jimenez fonseca

review: Works great. Easy to install and use. Well worth the money
author: Thomas Pluister

review: Works fine for what it is!

review: It was very useful you know you get what you pay for. I just love it

review: Awesome product the best I've ever used. Highly recommend.
